H0.text: Which organisation uses barbed wire and a candle as its symbol. Human Rights Watch

H1.text: Which organisation uses barbed wire and a candle as its symbol. The Red Cross

H2.text: Which organisation uses barbed wire and a candle as its symbol. UNHCR

H3.text: Which organisation uses barbed wire and a candle as its symbol. Amnesty.org

A4.text: The organization's logo combines two recognizable images inspired by the proverb, 'Better to light a candle than curse the darkness.' The candle represents the organization's efforts to bring light to the fact that political prisoners are held all over the world and its commitment to bring the prisoners hope for fair treatment and release. The barbed wire represents the hopelessness of people unjustly put in jail.
